ComicInfo.Title: The Man and the Mousey...; Cracked Interviews the Newspaper King; The Ridiculous Things of Life; The Not So Great Gadsby; Magazine Covers from the Planet of the Apes; The Cracked World of Snow; How Past Events Might Have Been Reported with a Government-Controlled Press; Olympics for Non-Athletes; What Will Super K Do When He Leaves the Government?; The Cracked History of Television; The Godfodder, Part XXIII
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.A man chases a mouse but it runs to the safety of a much larger mouse.
An executioner with principles refuses to accept tips.
Animals attack Sagebrush in retaliation for his littering.
Stanley invents money but when Gus suggests he needs to establish an exchange rate he regrets his invention.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:37:32. [Issue ID 250485]
ComicInfo.Writer: Oskar Blotta Jr.,Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Murray Ball,Joe Catalano
ComicInfo.Penciller: Oskar Blotta Jr.,Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Murray Ball,Bill Ward,Su Gumen
ComicInfo.Inker: Oskar Blotta Jr.,Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Murray Ball,Bill Ward,Su Gumen
